definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)

sentences.english: He is a lewd of a dandy, but admits skill, shrewd.
sentences.chinese: 他固然是個好色的紈絝子弟，但身手矯捷，精明能幹。

sentences.english: A few fops came out of the teahouse.
sentences.chinese: 從茶館裏走出幾個紈絝子弟。

sentences.english: John has a rputation for bing a man about town.
sentences.chinese: 約翰被人們以爲是一個紈絝子弟。

sentences.english: John has a reputation for being a man about town.
sentences.chinese: 約翰被人們認爲是一個紈絝子弟。
